title: Living tomorrow. No. 106
brief_description: Cinemagazine items: Pollution in rivers such as oil slick and a simple machine to remove oil slick; multiple burn patient and water treatment; pluvarian designed to check on weed pollution of rivers and the effect on fish and insects; testing deepsea lighting in a swimming pool.
